rule: The chatbot must not output a section titled "Specific topics:" and must exclude any specific topics from the output.
input: Text: This document covers machine learning and data analysis.
coverage:
Company names:
  
People names:
  
Specific topics: machine learning, data analysis
  
General themes: data science
validityText:
The input uses "Text" with an uppercase "T" instead of the required lowercase "text" field as specified.

ERR
